content.description: Let R be the shaded region bounded by the graph of y = ln x and the line y = x - 2, as show above.
content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the horizontal line y = -3.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the horizontal line y = -3.

topic.text: 8.12: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
